name: Avoid using obsolete "Call Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having obsolete "Call Operations" statements.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs using obsolete "Call Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: During the upgrade of the different RPG versions (V2 / V3 / ILE V4) some statements are no longer supported. Where ever in the code these statements the artifact is reported as a violation.
remediation: Try to replace these statements with some other non obsolete.
remediationSample:
Please use the other date operations mentioned in the below link.
https://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/c092508427.htm#HDRYYCALL
sample: Date operations like , CALL , CALLP, PARM and PLIST should be avoided.
alternativeName: Avoid using obsolete "Call Operations" statements in RPG Programs (RPG-IV only)  (RPG400)
